PERMISSIONS AND PRIVACY

When you click the play icon, this extension sends the contents of the page and its URL to our service. The service then converts the raw text into audio.

Content which you process with the service will be cached on the server for a short period.

More information on our privacy page: https://www.narrate2me.com/privacy-policy. Feel free to contact us if you have any questions.
